amendatorysection.catchline: Bridges; right of eminent domain; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: If any such city shall desire to acquire any existing bridge or lease thereof or all interests therein by the exercise of the power of eminent domain, and shall have received any such authority as may be necessary from the government of the United States, it may exercise such power in such manner as Congress may require, and if the manner is not prescribed by Congress, the procedure to condemn property shall be exercised in the manner set forth in sections 76-704 to 76-724.
